snippet: The United States lost to Slovakia, 4-2, for its first loss at the men’s world championships in Helsinki, Finland, after opening with two victories.
abstract: United States hockey team loses to Slovakia, 4-2, for its first loss at the men’s world championships in Helsinki, Finland, after opening with two victories.
lead_paragraph: The United States lost to Slovakia, 4-2, for its first loss at the men’s world championships in Helsinki, Finland, after opening with two victories.
